tweet: Worries go down better with soup than without.  Jewish proverb
There are many things that will catch my eye, but only a few that will catch my heart.  It is those I consider to pursue.  Tim Redmond
If you love what you do, you are more likely to make it successful, and if you fail, at least you love going to work.  Mark Cuban
All problems become smaller if you don't dodge them but confront them.  William Halsey
A dead battery can't charge another battery.  Keith Harrell
